trans-unit.source: Represents an element for associating a semantic value with a phrase in a grammar.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta un elemento per associare un valore di semantico una frase in una grammatica.

trans-unit.source: This object is similar to the `tag` element defined by the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) [Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) Version 1.0.](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761).
trans-unit.target: È simile a questo oggetto di `tag` elemento definito del World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) [vocale riconoscimento grammatica specifica (SRGS) versione 1.0.](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761).

trans-unit.source: However, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag.Value%2A> property of this object cannot be script.
trans-unit.target: Tuttavia, la <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag.Value%2A>proprietà di questo oggetto non può essere script.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: The contents of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag.Value%2A> can be of the type <xref:System.Boolean>, <xref:System.Double>, <xref:System.Int32>, or <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: Il contenuto di <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag.Value%2A>può essere di tipo <xref:System.Boolean>, <xref:System.Double>, <xref:System.Int32>, o <xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String> </xref:System.Int32> </xref:System.Double> </xref:System.Boolean> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: String values must be enclosed in double quotes.
trans-unit.target: I valori stringa devono essere racchiusi tra virgolette doppie.

trans-unit.source: To add semantics as script, use <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsSemanticInterpretationTag>.
trans-unit.target: Per aggiungere la semantica come script, utilizzare <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsSemanticInterpretationTag>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsSemanticInterpretationTag>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag"></xref> class, specifying a value for the instance.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag"> </xref> (classe), specificando un valore per l'istanza.

trans-unit.source: The value used to set the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag.Value*> property.
trans-unit.target: Il valore utilizzato per impostare il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag.Value*>proprietà.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag.Value*>

trans-unit.source: value is .
trans-unit.target: valueis .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag"></xref> class, specifying a name and a value for the instance.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag"> </xref> (classe), specificando un nome e un valore per l'istanza.

trans-unit.source: The string used to set the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag.Name*> property on the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: La stringa utilizzata per impostare il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag.Name*>proprietà il <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag"> </xref> oggetto.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag.Name*>

trans-unit.source: The object used to set the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag.Value*> property on the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto utilizzato per impostare il <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag.Value*>proprietà il <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag"> </xref> oggetto.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag.Value*>

trans-unit.source: value is .
trans-unit.target: valueis .

trans-unit.source: name is .
trans-unit.target: nameis .

trans-unit.source: name is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: nameè una stringa vuota.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il nome del <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag"> </xref> istanza.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the name of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Una stringa che contiene il nome del <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag"> </xref> istanza.

trans-unit.source: An attempt is made to set Name to <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Viene effettuato un tentativo di impostare nome <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An attempt is made to set Name to an empty string.
trans-unit.target: Un tentativo di impostare un nome di una stringa vuota.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value contained in the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il valore contenuto nella <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag"> </xref> istanza.

trans-unit.source: The valid types for the Value property are: - <xref:System.Boolean> - <xref:System.Double> - <xref:System.Int32> - <xref:System.String>
trans-unit.target: I tipi validi per la proprietà Value sono:- <xref:System.Boolean>- <xref:System.Double>- <xref:System.Int32>- <xref:System.String></xref:System.String> </xref:System.Int32> </xref:System.Double> </xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: The value contained in the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Il valore contenuto nella <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsNameValueTag"> </xref> istanza.

trans-unit.source: An attempt is made to set Value to <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Viene effettuato un tentativo di impostare un valore <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An attempt is made to set Value to an invalid type.
trans-unit.target: Un tentativo di impostare un valore per un tipo non valido.
